    choiceModel

    • Uses of RouteChoiceModel in choiceModel

      Subclasses of RouteChoiceModel in choiceModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RSUE
      Although it is not computationally the most efficient, the RSUE is implemented as a special case of the RSUET where the threshold is infinity.
      class  RSUET
      This class of route choice models, originated from Thomas Kj√¶r Rasmussen of the Technical University of Denmark, has extremely attractive computational properties when the lower reference cost phi function equals RefCostMin

    • Uses of RouteChoiceModel in network

      Methods in network with parameters of type RouteChoiceModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double Path.computeEnumeratorInProbabilityExpression(RouteChoiceModel rcm)
      Computes the enumerator in the probability expression of the route choice model (most often simply a RUM) using the route choice model's own method of the same name.
      double Path.computeTransformedCost(RouteChoiceModel rcm)
      Calculate the transformed cost of this path.
      double Path.updateTransformedCost(RouteChoiceModel rcm)
      Calculates and updates the transformed cost of this path
      void Network.updateTransformedCosts(RouteChoiceModel rcm)
      Update the transformed costs on all paths in restricted choice sets, using the passed route choice model.
